title: Syllabus mentioned in ERP
text: Human factors theory, man-machine function allocation, human factors in design, control panel design, location of control and displays, illumination and noise levels, labels, location of components, safety requirement accessibility etc. quantitative techniques for human factor data collection, human factors in production and in field testing, measurement and prediction of human reliability, factors affecting Human Reliability.
